about.title: Frontend Engineer, Developer Relations and AI research enthusiast. Always influenced by design. Based in Rosario, Argentina ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡·
about.description: Passionate about creating innovative tech solutions for social impact. Focused on using advanced frontend technologies to improve accessibility and performance in web applications. My main goal is to enhance user experience, making the web a better place for everyone.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer & Technical Researcher
description: Researched and implemented new frontend technologies and tools.
Developed innovative solutions to improve the frontend community.
Conducted technical research to stay ahead of industry trends.
Created and maintained open-source projects.
Collaborated with team members to enhance project outcomes.

jobs.title: Technical Researcher & Content Developer
description: Created technical content to educate and engage the frontend community.
Developed tutorials and guides on the latest frontend technologies.
Managed the content strategy to align with community needs and trends.
Collaborated with experts to produce high-quality, informative content.
Utilized various platforms to distribute content and maximize reach.

jobs.title: Developer Experience Architect
description: Built and nurtured a non-profit open community for Next.js enthusiasts.
Developed resources to enhance the developer experience with Next.js.
Organized community events and workshops.
Provided mentorship and support to community members.
Collaborated with other community leaders to expand the community reach.

jobs.title: DevOps & Infrastructure Specialist
description: Migrated from WordPress to Webflow, boosting performance.
Configured Cloudflare for SSL and DNS.
Streamlined deployments to minimize downtime.
Automated workflows for efficiency.
Aligned infrastructure with business needs.

jobs.title: Operator & Advanced AI Trainer
description: Managed AI system operations to ensure optimal performance.
Trained advanced AI models to improve system accuracy.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop AI solutions.
Analyzed data to enhance AI training methodologies.
Implemented feedback to refine AI models continuously.

jobs.title: Developer Relations
description: Assisted developers in building applications using BaseHub CMS and native AI.
Provided technical support and guidance to developers.
Created documentation and tutorials for better product understanding.
Organized and conducted webinars and workshops.
Engaged with the developer community to gather feedback and improve the product.

jobs.title: QA Tester & Frontend Developer
description: Led QA testing using Jest and Playwright to ensure web applications' quality.
Implemented Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices.
Developed user-friendly interfaces with React.js.
Collaborated with developers to optimize code quality.
Conducted bug tracking and troubleshooting.

jobs.title: Technical Writer and Translator
description: Authored technical documentation, including whitepapers, guides, and tutorials.
Translated complex technical content for diverse audiences.
Facilitated user understanding of blockchain and DeFi concepts.
Collaborated with subject matter experts to ensure accuracy.
Maintained and updated documentation as needed.

jobs.title: Web Designer & Community Manager
description: Developed and designed responsive websites using WordPress.
Managed online tourist services for the city of Rosario.
Coordinated with the Rosario Hotel Association and Tourist Entity (ETUR).
Created engaging content for community outreach.
Implemented SEO strategies to improve website visibility.

jobs.title: Commercial Advisor
description: Maintained customer database for accuracy.
Executed marketing strategies to attract customers.
Managed services and ensured customer satisfaction.
Designed and implemented promotional campaigns with the marketing team.
Analyzed feedback and trends to improve services and marketing.

basehub-nextjs-blog.title: BaseHub - Next.js blog
basehub-nextjs-blog.description: A starter guide template blog made with Next.js and BaseHub CMS. It uses the BaseHub API to fetch and display posts.

chat-with-vader.title: Chat With Vader
chat-with-vader.description: A simple chat app that uses the OpenAI API and Vercel AI SDK to chat with Darth Vader.

cohere-chat.title: Cohere Chat
cohere-chat.description: A chatbot that uses the Cohere API to generate responses to user input.

comments-app.title: Comments App
comments-app.description: A simple comments app made with React and Vite.

crud-app.title: Crud App
crud-app.description: A simple CRUD app made with React and Vite.

eloquent-js-chat.title: Eloquent JavaScript Chat
eloquent-js-chat.description: In this app you will be able to interact with a intelligent llama that will answer your questions about JavaScript.

google-translate-ui.title: Google Translate UI
google-translate-ui.description: This is a simple API that uses the OpenAI GPT-4-vision-preview model to generate code from images.

image-to-code.title: Image 2 Code
image-to-code.description: This is a tool that converts images to code. It uses AI to generate code from images. It is based on the GPT-4-vision-preview model.

javascript-quiz.title: JavaScript Quiz
javascript-quiz.description: A simple quiz app made with React and Zustand.

meli-challenge.title: Mercado Libre Challenge
meli-challenge.description: Challenge to create a product search app using the Mercado Libre API. Built with Next.js and TypeScript.

mouse-follower.title: Mouse Follower
mouse-follower.description: A simple mouse follower app made with React and Vite.

morty-s-characters.title: Morty's characters
morty-s-characters.description: A simple app that lists all Morty's characters. Built with Next.js and GraphQL.

movie-search-app.title: Movie Search App
movie-search-app.description: A simple movie search app made with React and Vite.

nextjs-chat-app.title: Next.js Chat App
nextjs-chat-app.description: NextJS-Chat offers beginners a chat-based interface to learn Next.js and best coding practices through an AI expert.

nextjs-releases-app.title: Next.js Releases App
nextjs-releases-app.description: NextJS Releases is an App that tracks new releases on NextJS's GitHub repo.

react-gpt.title: React GPT
react-gpt.description: An AI-driven web engineering expert for React community.

screen-recorder.title: Screen Recorder
screen-recorder.description: Native screen recorder made with MediaRecorder web-api

shopping-cart.title: Shopping Cart
shopping-cart.description: A simple shopping cart app made with React and Vite.

spacex-launches.title: Space X Launches
spacex-launches.description: A simple app that lists all SpaceX launches. Built with Astro and TypeScript.

spotify-ui.title: Spotify UI
spotify-ui.description: An open-source Spotify clone built with Svelte and Astro.

swc-router.title: SWC Router
swc-router.description: Simple single-page applications (SPA) with ease using swc-router. This lightweight routing solution for React applications leverages the speed of SWC.

view-transitions-api.title: View Transitions API
view-transitions-api.description: This is a sample project that demonstrates how to use the View Transitions API with Astro.

tesla-landing-ui.title: Tesla Landing UI
tesla-landing-ui.description: An open-source Tesla landing page built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.

tic-tac-toe.title: Tic Tac Toe
tic-tac-toe.description: A simple tic-tac-toe game made with React and TypeScript.

todo-app.title: Todo App
todo-app.description: A simple todo app made with React and TypeScript.

twitter-follow-card-ui.title: Twitter Follow Card UI
twitter-follow-card-ui.description: An open-source Twitter follow card built with React and Vite.

twitter-ui.title: Twitter UI
twitter-ui.description: An open-source Twitter clone built with Next.js and Supabase.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me for questions, inquiries, or collaborations. Open to new opportunities and challenges.

on-submit.title: Spam detected
on-submit.description: Please, fill out the form correctly and without spam. Thanks!

ok.title: Email sent
ok.description: I will get back to you as soon as possible!

error.title: Error
error.description: There was an error while submitting the email. Please try again later.

form.card-description: Please, fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

first-name.min: First name must be at least 2 characters.
first-name.max: First name must be less than 50 characters.
first-name.regex: First name must contain only letters.

last-name.min: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
last-name.max: Last name must be less than 50 characters.
last-name.regex: Last name must contain only letters.

email.email: Email must be a valid email address.
email.min: Email must be at least 5 characters.
email.max: Email must be less than 100 characters.

message.min: Message must be at least 10 characters.
message.max: Message must be less than 500 characters.
